name: Bharat Greentech (PlanMyKart[dot]com)
overview:
PlanMyKart.com is an expert review driven social shopping and product discovery website. Think of Reviewgist meets Wanelo meets Nextag.

———————————————————–

Detailed Description:

PlanMyKart.com is an online platform that brings together Expert Reviews, Brands and E-commerce players on one single social shopping platform, in order to provide consumers with a holistic shopping experience. So consumers can plan their shopping with after going through reviews from category experts. The consumer can then shop through our e-commerce module which is essentially an online aggregation and price comparison tool that aggregates product across categories from our retail partners.

Such an eco-system that we are developing would ensure that the drop out rate of potential customers is reduced drastically during “Thought to Sales” process that currently spans on an average of 5-6 hours online and 2-3 days in an offline model. Hence you earn more revenues at lower cost thereby adding to both your topline as well as bottomline.

And hence our tag line - Plan it, Kart it !

The founding team members are graduates from Indian Institute of Management -Ahmedabad (FT Global Rank 11) and Indian Institute of Tecnology -Kharagpur who believe that this idea, would not only change the inherent shopping behaviour of the consumers but would also make the buying process more social, easy, efficient, organized and quality content oriented. This will help our partners to increase revenues and margins in more than one way.

offices.address1: A-55, Golf View Apartments, Near Malviya Nagar Metro Station
